_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Nginx
author: sinaloensemel@gmail.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Cloudflared Installation Script
#
apt-get update
apt-get install -y nginx

# Copy nginx config
cp -avr /etc/nginx/* /mnt/server/
rm -rf /mnt/server/sites-enabled/
mv /mnt/server/sites-available/ /mnt/server/sites-enabled/

# Create logs directory
mkdir -p /mnt/server/logs

# create tmp directory
mkdir -p /mnt/server/tmp

# create html directory
mkdir -p /home/container/html
